text: Aurora Pita Alonso (15 July 1936 â€“ 7 May 2021) was a Spanish-born Cuban television and stage actress. She was a member of the National Union of Writers and Artists of Cuba. Pita Alonso died in Havana, Cuba, on 7 May 2021, aged 84. ==References== == Other websites == *Pita Alonso at EcuRed Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths
